sub_title: Project & Communications Coordinator at ISSO │ Curriculum development
summary:
Passionate education professional determined to improve childhood education by optimizing learning processes to meet the needs of students and society as a whole.

Interested in innovative learning environments, professional learning communities and educational project management.

Experience working in various educational institutions (preschools, schools and universities) and roles (teacher, educational psychologist, and educational consultant).
